rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
长期使用某些孕激素药物可能会增加颅内脑膜瘤的风险《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项法国研究发现，长期使用某些孕激素药物会增加患一种脑肿瘤（称为颅内脑膜瘤）的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Long-term-use-of-certain-progestogen-drugs-may-raise-risk-of-intraranial-meningioma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Long-term-use-of-certain-progestogen-drugs-may-raise-risk-of-intraranial-meningioma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da8bf320-bf43-4054-bdab-e3a3f521b8c6 Wed, 27 Mar 2024 23:56:59 -0400 Long-term use of certain progestogen drugs may raise risk of intracranial meningioma
患有谵妄的老年人患痴呆症的可能性是其他人的三倍昆士兰大学的研究人员发现，患有谵妄的老年患者患痴呆症的可能性是其他人的三倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Older-people-with-delirium-third-times-more-likely-to-develop-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Older-people-with-delirium-third-times-more-likely-to-develop-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72ed2594-4292-416b-a6e1-05f8d1a6e8b2 Wed, 27 Mar 2024 23:53:53 -0400 Older people with delirium three times more likely to develop dementia
谷歌街景根据社区特征预测心脏病风险研究人员使用谷歌街景来研究建筑环境的数百个元素，包括建筑物、绿地、人行道和道路，以及这些元素如何相互关联以及如何影响居住在这些社区的人们的冠状动脉疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Google-Street-View-predicts-heart-disease-risk-based-on-neighborhood-features.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Google-Street-View-predicts-heart-disease-risk-based-on-neighborhood-features.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46b265d4-4db9-4ce1-bf51-6c2827f8490c Wed, 27 Mar 2024 23:51:10 -0400 Google Street View predicts heart disease risk based on neighborhood features
改善 NHS 员工条件对于服务和患者结果至关重要英国医学杂志关于 NHS 未来委员会的第三份报告中的专家表示，照顾 NHS 员工不仅是一项道德责任，也是一项合理的投资，必须成为重中之重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Improving-NHS-staff-conditions-essential-for-service-and-病人-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Improving-NHS-staff-conditions-essential-for-service-and-patent-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eac2f340-c43e-48e5-aedd-73aed349402c Wed, 27 Mar 2024 23:47:48 -0400 Improving NHS staff conditions essential for service and patient outcomes
与普通人群相比，无家可归者的痴呆症发病率更高根据劳森健康研究所和 ICES 的最新研究，无家可归者的痴呆症发病率是一般人群的 1.9 倍，其中 85 岁以下年龄组的患病率更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Unhoused-people-face-elevated-dementia-rates-compared-to-general-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Unhoused-people-face-elevated-dementia-rates-compared-to-general-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e26d326-a9d8-42c7-bf92-d5f37fb2627a Wed, 27 Mar 2024 23:20:34 -0400 Unhoused people face elevated dementia rates compared to general population
谵妄会增加老年患者的痴呆风险和死亡率《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项规模最大的同类研究发现，谵妄是老年人痴呆和死亡的一个重要危险因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Delirium-increases-dementia-risk-and-mortality-in-older-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Delirium-increases-dementia-risk-and-mortality-in-older-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00627a7b-9c87-4bda-9ed2-91dd06676bbf Wed, 27 Mar 2024 23:07:31 -0400 Delirium increases dementia risk and mortality in older patients
新发现的分子可能是三阴性乳腺癌的潜在治疗靶点广岛大学的一组研究人员发现了一种促进癌细胞产生的分子。该分子可能被证明是治疗三阴性乳腺癌（一种侵袭性乳腺癌）的潜在治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Newly-discovered-molecule-may-be-a-potial-therapeutic-target-for-triple-阴性-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Newly-discovered-molecule-may-be-a-pottial-therapeutic-target-for-triple-male-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fb32a21-efae-4bbb-904f-835178fe4d00 Wed, 27 Mar 2024 23:02:57 -0400 Newly discovered molecule may be a potential therapeutic target for triple-negative breast cancer
应对老年人性传播感染的增加在今年欧洲临床微生物学和传染病大会（ECCMID 2024，巴塞罗那，4 月 27 日至 30 日）会前一天发表的一项新研究综述将着眼于如何应对老年人性传播感染 (STI) 的增加人，如淋病、梅毒和尖锐湿疣。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Managing-the-rise-in-STI-among-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Managing-the-rise-in-STI-among-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9153dfab-5f3b-4aec-9ba8-2db95eb4e80d Wed, 27 Mar 2024 22:50:32 -0400 Managing the rise in STIs among older adults
GPT-4 在定位中风后脑部病变方面显示出前景人工智能（AI）可能成为神经科医生未来的工具，帮助定位中风发生在大脑的位置。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/GPT-4-shows-promise-in- located-brain-lesions-after-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/GPT-4-shows-promise-in- located-brain-lesions-after-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5801fa2-2869-4884-aa86-5a4b95caaccc Wed, 27 Mar 2024 22:36:27 -0400 GPT-4 shows promise in locating brain lesions after stroke
感觉神经元在协调组织修复和再生中发挥关键作用莫纳什大学和大阪大学的研究人员公布了一项关于感觉神经元在协调组织修复和再生中的关键作用的突破性发现，为组织愈合不良和糖尿病患者带来了重大希望。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Sensory-neurons-play-pivotal-role-in-orchestrating-tissue-repair-and-regenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240327/Sensory-neurons-play-pivotal-role-in-orchestrating-tissue-repair-and-regenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11aacf9c-a4c6-419d-bb65-61465c7d2d0a Wed, 27 Mar 2024 22:30:00 -0400 Sensory neurons play pivotal role in orchestrating tissue repair and regeneration
